turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please, Mary, do mind ordering coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like me to call the one in Safeway or the one by McDonalds?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one by McDonalds please, it has a drive through.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large mocha latte, and whatever you would like for yourself.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it'll be a large mocha. Milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, skim milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And, whipped cream please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it'll be a large mocha latte, with skim milk, whipped cream, and no added sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you be able to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, as soon as I finish, I'll go.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you mind checking if they have blue berry muffins?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course not.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You can ask the rest of the office if they would also like something.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will do that, then I'll put the order right away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. I really needed a second breakfast today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll get it done in no time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I appreciate it.
